turns.answer:
In Mafia, the goal is to kill as many people as possible.

There are no minimum amount of money to be raised.

You need to be willing to kill as many people as possible in order to win a good job
turns.label: unknown

turns.answer: There was no time or place you may have been in the game, but no time or place you may have left it. This is the game where everyone is looking down on you and you are trying to make everyone look bad. Do not
